survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users who have experienced rides in autonomous vehicles to evaluate their satisfaction and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing an autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing an autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the safety of your autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring safety perception.

script.question_text: How would you rate the safety of your autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: Were there any technical issues during your ride?
questions.client_notes: Binary question to identify if technical issues were encountered.

script.question_text: Were there any technical issues during your ride?

questions.question_text: If you experienced any technical issues, please describe them in detail.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather detailed feedback on technical issues.

script.question_text: If you experienced any technical issues, please describe them in detail.

questions.question_text: Would you recommend autonomous vehicle rides to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring likelihood to recommend.

script.question_text: Would you recommend autonomous vehicle rides to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for autonomous vehicle rides?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback for improvements.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for autonomous vehicle rides?
